SEARCH
Package com.coms309.isu_pulse_frontend.api

Class FacultyApiService

java.lang.Object
com.coms309.isu_pulse_frontend.api.FacultyApiService
public class FacultyApiService extends Object
Service class for interacting with the Faculty API. This service provides methods to fetch faculty schedules and announcements.
